name: ogre-js
description: Object graph manager, built with ReactJS in mind.
author: Matt McCray <matt@elucidata.net>

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run build-test && clear && mocha
scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run build-min && npm run build-test && npm run build-lib
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production browserify -s ogre -t coffeeify --extension='.coffee' -t envify src/ogre.coffee > dist/ogre.js
scripts.build-min: NODE_ENV=production browserify -s ogre -t coffeeify --extension='.coffee' -t envify -t uglifyify src/ogre.coffee | uglifyjs -c  -m > dist/ogre.min.js
scripts.build-test: coffee -b -c -j test/all-tests.js test/src/test-helpers.coffee test/src/test-api.coffee test/src/test-flows.coffee test/src/misc-test.coffee
scripts.dist: npm run test && npm run build-min
